title: What Does Torta Mean on TikTok and Social Media?

steps.title: â€œTortaâ€ is Spanish slang that describes a full-figured Hispanic woman.
steps.content: â€œTortaâ€ is Spanish slang that describes a full-figured Hispanic woman. The term (pronounced TOHR-tah) is popular on TikTok, often being used in a derogatory way. However, some users have reclaimed it and added a positive spin. On June 28, 2024, TikTok user @lovelystarr_ posted a video of herself with the Torta hashtag and the caption reading â€œBody positivity ğŸ–¤ğŸ’œ.â€ This meaning stems from the torta food, which is a breaded sandwich with various meats, cheeses, sauces, and veggies. [1] X Research source Torta directly translates to cake. [2] X Research source Torta can be used as a term of affection if youâ€™re with a large woman, but you run the risk of objectifying a woman because of her body type. Torta is also a way to refer to lesbians. This meaning is common in Argentina and is sometimes used in a derogatory way.

steps.title: Yes, calling someone a torta can be offensive.
steps.content: Yes, calling someone a torta can be offensive. Depending on the context itâ€™s used in, torta can offend heavyset people, as the term singles them out based on their weight and compares them to a large sandwich. If you decide to use torta as a term of affection or endearment, be very careful. You might end up hurting someoneâ€™s feelings. Despite its offensive connotation, some TikTok users have reclaimed the term. On February 5, 2024, user @sandritamrev posted a video saying, â€œWhen someone calls you a torta on here like itâ€™s some type of insult, have they ever had one? Theyâ€™re, like, the best!â€

steps.title: Online users use torta as a derogatory way to describe large women.
steps.content: Online users use torta as a derogatory way to describe large women. Some TikTok users use the phrase in skits to make fun of large women. On May 11, 2024, TikTok user @supreme_mando posted a video with the caption â€œPOV-When sheâ€™s a torta. â€ In the video, he routinely insulted a womanâ€™s weight by saying things like â€œBesides eating, what do you like to do for fun?â€

steps.title: The slang torta comes from the sandwich of the same name.
steps.content: The slang torta comes from the sandwich of the same name. Since a torta is a type of sandwich, Mexican Americans have used the term to refer to large women, going back to the â€˜90s. In fact, the first recorded use of torta as a slang term was in 1995. [3] X Research source

steps.title: No mames
steps.content: No mames No mames (pronounced no MAH-mays) is a slang term that means â€œno wayâ€ or â€œyou canâ€™t be serious.â€ This term has a more crude connotation, though, similar to the English phrase â€œno fâ€”ing way.â€

steps.title: Orale
steps.content: Orale Orale (pronounced OH-rah-lay) is a slang word that is used as a word of affirmation, similar to okay. Its meaning changes based on the context it is used in, but it is mainly used as an informal way to say â€œokay,â€ â€œalright,â€ â€œwow,â€ â€œcome on,â€ or â€œhurry up.â€

steps.title: Fresita
steps.content: Fresita A Fresita (pronounced FREH-see-tah) is a wealthy or superficial teenager, usually a woman. Fresa can also be used in place of fresita

steps.title: Hyna
steps.content: Hyna Hyna (pronounced HI-nah) is Mexican-American slang that refers to a good-looking chick or girl. It is often used to refer to someoneâ€™s significant other.

steps.title: Big back
steps.content: Big back Big back is another derogatory term that is used to describe heavier people. It is popular on TikTok, with users using the phrase in moments when someone eats a lot of food, which they would refer to as â€œbig back activities.â€

steps.title: Zesty
steps.content: Zesty Zesty is used on TikTok to describe someone who is acting feminine. It is often used in a homophobic context, as people use it to make gay men the butt of the joke.

steps.title: Bop
steps.content: Bop The word bop is a misogynistic term thatâ€™s used to refer to a woman that someone deems as promiscuous. The term is often used to slut-shame women.
